upsc.framework.api

Class UpscSIM

  • java.lang.Object
    • upsc.framework.api.UpscSIM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUPSC
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UpscSIMEmulation

    public class UpscSIM
extends Object
implements IUPSC
    The public class of IUPSC's implements. Only for SIM card.

        length - the length of the key to be generated

      • createAsymmetricKey

        public KeyRSAPair createAsymmetricKey(KeyLengthAsymmetric length,
                                      byte[] pin)
                               throws UPSCException
        Description copied from interface: IUPSC
        Generates and wraps an RSA key
        Specified by:
        createAsymmetricKey in interface IUPSC
        Parameters:
        length - the length of the key.
        pin - set this to protect the key(code) with a pin. Can be null, than askPin has to be false.
        Returns:
        A keypair that consist of a plain public key and an RSAKeyCode, an encrypted/wrapped private key.
        Throws:
        UPSCException - if any error occurs.

        Specified by:
        encrypt in interface IUPSC
        Parameters:
        publicKey - the public key to protect the internally generated symmetric key with
        data - the data to be encrypted
        Returns:
        A structure containing the iv, encrypted data and the RSA encrypted symmetric key.

                         PinEncoded encryptedPin,
                         byte[] pin)
                  throws UPSCException

        Asks the user for a pin code and verifies it against a previously encrypted pin.
        Specified by:
        verifyPin in interface IUPSC
        Parameters:
        keyCode - the keycode with which the encrypted pin is protected
        encryptedPin - the previously encrypted pin
        pin - PIN to be verified with decrypted PIN
        Returns:
        true if the pin was verified, false if not
